title: Ultimate Skin Idea - Seasonal Maokai/Zyra
body:
Not my original idea, but I thought I might as well say it again.

I do believe Seasonal Zyra would work more since there are FAR more animation/models to play around with to make it an ultimate skin.

I could only see Seasonal Maokai being at most a 1820RP skin...

What I really really want to see:
Arclight Zyra - raising circle of  light (q), light bubbles (w), light wave (e), larger light circle with outward pulse and raising burst of light to finish. Plants = angle with sword & angel with bow.  
Void Zyra - see above except darkness retracts inward on completion. Plants = Void plant melee & range 
Program Zyra - like project/mecha/arcade - thinking along the lines of data transfer to morph into digitised abilities. Something similar to tron.
Scoceress Zyra - human version (ie. regarding her lore) sorceress that travelled into the woods. casting dulled down version of lux (in a nutshell)

Further ideas: 
Antlantian / Pool Party Zyra w/ seaweed beach theme
Order of the Lotus Zyra - fancy version of original skin
Elderwood Zyra - wooden/ more ornate/ accented version
So yeh tip for the future: Before posting check out the League of Legends wiki. Festive Maokai has existed for a number of years and is only 975.
